description:
Hooké's incredible adventure began 11 years ago, in 2012. Our ''Since 2012'' hoodie reminds us that all adventures deserve to be lived without looking back.

Made of 60% recycled polyester / 40% organic cotton it has a reduced ecological footprint while remaining soft and cozy. A great basic that will give a nice look to any outfit.
name: Hooke Since 2012 Hoodie - Mens
